name: 'Popping Stars
description:
Once you pop, you can't stop!

For the first time, we are introducing 4 game mode to make it fun for everyone.

-Classic: meet the target score for each stage
-Timed: do your best in 60 seconds, and earn coins
-Moves: limited 30 moves,take your time and make the best moves
-Adventure: every stage has its own target, try your best to get 3 stars

Make use of the bonus items to get higher scores and challenge world records.

Let's pop! Let's have fun.
